body:
Comment 1: 
Idea: add to go/types a demo tool that can be invoked like so:

  % refs -id=<regexp> pkg1 pkg2 pkg3 

where the pkg arguments, interpreted similar to 'go test', would be loaded and type
checked.   The tool would then print, for all objects whose name matches the regexp, the
set of ast.Idents which resolve to it, a bit like a "typed" grep.

The point of this would be:
- to illustrate how to build and query the resolver's reference graph.
- to prove that we can load multiple packages from source, including *_test.go files.
- to demonstrate integration with go/build.
